Help.desc: Get a list of available commands.

options.name: PATTERN
options.desc: String pattern to use to pick professor.

Quiet.desc: Turn off all messages for a time.

options.name: TIME
options.desc: Length of time for command to be active.

Swear.desc: Turn on the swear 'filter' for a time.

options.name: TIME
options.desc: Length of time for command to be active.

options.name: UNIX
options.desc: Unix time at which reminder will trigger.

options.name: VERBOSITY
options.desc: Set the level of detail on the output. V or Verbose triggers all output. Q or Quiet triggers minimum output.

Evangelize.desc: Retrieves a verse concerning our true savior.
